title: Min and Max of Array Based on Provided Function
description: In this lab, we will explore how to find the minimum and maximum values of an array based on a provided function. We will use the `reduce()` method in combination with a comparator function to return the appropriate element in the array. By the end of the lab, you will have a good understanding of how to use this method to find the minimum and maximum values in an array based on your custom comparator function.

steps.title: Min and Max of Array Based on Provided Function

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
